title: Ticket #1171: admin-man section 3.8 on Checkpoint server: only for std univ jobs
description:
Admin manual, section 3.8 on "The Checkpoint Server" fails to ever mention that Condor only produces checkpoints for standard universe jobs.

User Genie Jhang points this out in a condor-users post of Jan 28, 2010.
check_ins: 2010-Mar-01 13:07   Check-in [25341]: gittrac #1171: checkpoint server is for checkpoints, which only get produced by standard universe jobs. Made this point obvious. (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
